description:

description: Forza Horizon 5 is the latest racing simulation game developed by Playground Games. The Apex Allstars Series has arrived to the game bringing the new EventLab props, Car Pack, collectibles, and more. Players can start racing across Mexico’s roads with 5 reward cars featuring some of the greatest GT racers. The Apex Allstars Series for Forza Horizon 5 is available now for Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, and PC.
title: Forza Horizon 5 - Official Apex Allstars Series Overview Launch Trailer

description: The Avengers: Endgame anniversary is here, and what better time is there to think of Avengers: Endgame and its impact. The Avengers movies are monumental, with Iron Man beginning the whole saga and Endgame finalizing it all alongside Captain America and Thor. This will never happen again, Marvel Studios did something that can’t be repeated, with Avengers: Infinity War setting up the crowning achievement, with Thanos actually winning out. Will Chris Evans and Robert Downey Jr. return? Some say that’s debatable, but as shown in characters like Black Widow or Hulk, even if a return can happen, it may still never touch Avengers: Endgame levels ever again. Tony Stark changed what a superhero movie could be, with his power in the way eclipsing even Captain Marvel. It’s hard not to have emotions stirred by the sound of the theme song of Avengers (or maybe specifically the Avengers Infinity War theme song), and that took time to craft and create. Will there ever be another Avengers: Endgame?
title: Avengers Endgame: We'll Never See Anything Like It Again

description:
Take a look at the latest clip for Episode 14 of Star Wars: The Bad Batch Final Season as Omega feels her brothers coming to her aid in escaping Mount Tantiss once and for all springing her into action.

Star Wars: The Bad Batch is executive produced by Dave Filoni (“Ahsoka,” “The Mandalorian”), Athena Portillo (“Star Wars: The Clone Wars,” “Star Wars Rebels”), Brad Rau (“Star Wars Rebels,” “Star Wars Resistance”), Jennifer Corbett (“Star Wars Resistance,” “NCIS”) and Carrie Beck ("Ahsoka," “The Mandalorian”), with Josh Rimes (“Star Wars Resistance,” "Star Wars: Visions") as co-executive producer and Alex Spotswood (“Star Wars: The Clone Wars,” “Star Wars Rebels”) as senior producer. Rau is also serving as supervising director with Corbett as head writer. 

Episode 14 of Star Wars: The Bad Batch Final Season is streaming now on Disney Plus.

#StarWars
title: Star Wars: The Bad Batch Final Season - Official 'Flash Strike' Clip (2024)

description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Fallout 4's much-anticipated next-gen (or rather, current-gen) update went live today, and though it was touted as a free upgrade, some users won't be able to download it without handing over some bottle caps. It seems like PlayStation 4 and 5 owners who downloaded the game when it was free via PS Plus can't download the update unless they pay for the game. Bethesda did mention that the upgrade was free to those who purchased the game, either physically or digitally, and  technically PS Plus subscribers didn't outright pay for their copies. However, Game Pass subscribers aren't having the same issues, but that's likely because Microsoft owns Bethesda now, and Bethesda games are just included with Game Pass subscriptions. In other Fallout news, be wary of any Fallout: New Vegas advice on social media. Veteran players are having a little fun with newbies to the Wasteland by pointing them to spots in the world that new players just should not go to unless they're pr
title: Fallout 4's Next-Gen Update Isn't Free for PS Plus Subscribers - IGN Daily Fix

description:
Soulmask is an open-world survival crafting simulation RPG developed by CampFire Studio. Players will be able to wear a plethora of Masks that have unique abilities such as the gift of immortality, walking among their enemies concealed in the shadows, fire homing missiles with dead accuracy, and more. Take a look at the latest Mask gameplay showing off what's possible in Soulmask launching later in 2024 with an open beta on May 1.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Soulmask - Official Mask Gameplay Overview Trailer

description:
Pinball FX is a free-to-play pinball arcade simulation game developed by Zen Studios. Players can now play on a Pacific Rim-styles deck to demolish the Kaijus as Gipsy Danger and steer your Jaeger to the Breach to cancel the apocalypse. Strengthen the link between Raleigh and Mako by shooting the correct lanes in succession and uncovering secrets by hitting the bumpers. Pinball FX Pacific Rim pinball is launching on May 16 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#PacificRim #Gaming #Pinball
title: Pinball FX - Official Pacific Rim Pinball Announcement Trailer

description:
Here's the Stellar Blade launch trailer. Stellar Blade is a third-person story-driven action-adventure RPG developed by Shift Up. Players will embody Eve on her quest to reclaim Earth for Humankind. Engage in intense combat with the Naytiba and piece together the mysteries of the past in the ruins of human civilization. Stellar Blade is launching on April 26 for PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#StellarBlade #Gaming #IGN
title: Stellar Blade - Official Launch Trailer

description:
Welcome to New Eridu — Where Humanity Rises Anew! Zenless Zone Zero Pre-Registration is available! Go now!
https://zenless.hoyoverse.com/en-us/main

Zenless Zone Zero is an upcoming urban fantasy action RPG from HoYoverse. Players will discover New Eridu, the last shelter for urban civilization due to the calamity. Together with a group of distinctive partners, they will fight alongside each other and unravel the mysteries in this post-apocalyptic world.

#IGN
title: Zenless Zone Zero Pre-Registration Available Now - Official Trailer

description:
Here's how to grow your Manor Lords population. Keeping an entire village happy is a massive task on its own - let alone having to keep them fed and stocked with resources to utilize and sell for profit. In this Manor Lords guide, we will discuss How to Grow Your Population in Manor Lords, how to keep the Manor Lords villagers alive and thriving, and the major downsides to growing the population before you’re fully prepared. 

0:00 - Intro
0:29 - How to Grow the Manor Lords Population
2:45 - How to Keep Manor Lords Villagers Happy
3:18 - The Disadvantages of Growing
4:29 - More Manor Lords Tips!

For more on Manor Lords, check out our Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/manor-lords 

#ManorLords #Gaming #IGN
title: Manor Lords: How to Grow Population (And Keep Them Alive)

description:
The apocalypse is looking brand spanking new thanks to the latest update to Fallout 4. With fixes, improvements, and new adventures to experience, it’s a meaty upgrade. Here are the biggest changes this next gen patch is bringing to Fallout 4. 

Included in these changes are new 4k graphics and "up to 60fps" performance modes for console, wide and ultrawide support for pc, new questline, equipment, power armor, and stability improvements. For a full list of the changes, check out our page on IGN:
https://www.ign.com/articles/fallout-4-next-gen-update-rolling-out-now

#IGN #Gaming #Fallout4
title: Fallout 4 - Biggest Changes in Next Gen Update

description:
Looking to start Manor Lords trading? Manor Lords is hitting early access, and while it's still a work-in-progress, there's a ton to learn and do! Between growing your population, gathering supplies, building housing, and even combat with other regions, it's easy to miss info on a very important mechanic, trading!

Trading is a mechanic in Manor Lords that you can go a long time without using, and consequently, it can be a bit tough to figure out! Let’s go over the different kinds of trading, the best ways to use it, and a few Manor Lords tips to help get you started. Here's Manor Lords trading explained:

0:00 - Intro
0:25 - Manor Lords Trading Within Your Regions
1:45 - Manor Lords Trading With Outside Forces
4:30 - More Manor Lords Tips!

For more on Manor Lords, check out our Wiki guides at https://www.ign.com/wikis/manor-lords 

#ManorLords #Gaming #IGN
title: Manor Lords - How to Start Trading (Early Access)

description:
The Exorcism is a horror film distributed by Miramax and Outerbanks Entertainment. 

A troubled actor who begins to unravel while shooting a supernatural horror film. His estranged daughter, Lee, wonders if he's slipping back into his past addictions or if there's something more sinister at play.

The Exorcism stars Russell Crowe, Sam Worthington, Chloe Bailey, Adam Goldberg, and David Hyde Pierce. The film is directed by Joshua John Miller and written by M.A. Fortin & Joshua John Miller. The Exorcism is produced by Kevin Williamson, Ben Fast, Bill Block.

The Exorcism releases into theaters on June 7.

#IGN #Movies
title: The Exorcism - Official Trailer (2024) Russell Crowe, Sam Worthington, Chloe Bailey

description: In this exclusive 5-minute video, Studios Extrairdinaires co-founders André Hedetoft and Andreas Troedsson delve into the making of the Fort Solis production for the big screen. They share why Fort Solis was chosen for adaptation, the vision driving the film, and the progress they've made so far, offering viewers a unique glimpse into the filmmaking process.
title: Fort Solis Directors on Adapting the Video Game for Film and TV

description:
Arena Breakout Infinite is a new installment in the first-person shooter franchise developed by MoreFun Studios. Players will duke it out on two popular maps, Farm and Valley, to search and extract valuable loot in the war-torn region of Kamona. Push through tough battles where the stakes are high and the rewards even higher. Take a look at the gameplay reveal for Arena Breakout: Infinite, coming soon to PC with a closed beta beginning on May 8.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Arena Breakout: Infinite - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer

description:
Check out the trailer for Dead Boy Detectives, an upcoming series that is a part of The Sandman Universe for Netflix and based on the comic series from Neil Gaiman. Dead Boy Detectives stars George Rexstrew, Jayden Revri, Kassius Nelson, Jenn Lyon, Briana Cuoco, Yuyu Kitamura, Ruth Connell, Lukas Gage, and David Iacono.

Do you have a pesky ghost haunting you? Has a demon stolen your core memories? You may want to ring the Dead Boy Detectives.

Meet Edwin Payne (George Rexstrew) and Charles Rowland (Jayden Revri), “the brains” and “the brawn” behind the Dead Boy Detectives agency. Teenagers born decades apart who find each other only in death, Edwin and Charles are best friends and ghosts… who solve mysteries. They will do anything to stick together – including escaping evil witches, Hell and Death herself. With the help of a clairvoyant named Crystal (Kassius Nelson) and her friend Niko (Yuyu Kitamura), they are able to crack some of the mortal realm’s most mystifying paranormal case
title: Dead Boy Detectives - Official Trailer (2024) George Rexstrew, Jayden Revri

description:
Watch the latest Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes featurette and join actor Andy Serkis and director/producer Wes Ball as they discuss the legacy of the Planet of the Apes franchise. Andy Serkis, who previously voiced Caesar in the Planet of the Apes trilogy, talks about passing the baton for this new movie, which is set several generations after Caesar’s reign.

In the upcoming movie, Apes are the dominant species living harmoniously with one another and humans have been reduced to living in the shadows. As a new tyrannical ape leader builds his empire, one young ape will undertake a harrowing journey that will cause him to question all that he has known about the past and to make choices that will define a future for apes and humans alike.

Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes stars Owen Teague, Freya Allan, William H. Macy, Dichen Lachman, Kevin Durand, Peter Macon, and Travis Jeffery. The film is written by Josh Friedman (“War of the Worlds”), based on characters created by Rick Jaf
title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes - Exclusive Legacy Behind the Scenes (2024) Andy Serkis, Wes Ball

description:
Wondering how to find the Fallout 4 Fat Man location and Fallout 4 Mini Nuke location? Fallout 4 contains myriad ways to blast your enemies into oblivion, but one of the strongest (and fun) methods is using a Fat Man launcher and a mini-nuke. Here's how to find both immediately after leaving Vault 111 when you start your journey across Boston, in our helpful Fallout 4 guide.

We've got tons of Fallout 4 coverage across both YouTube and our guide on IGN. Make sure you check it out along with our interactive map here:
https://www.ign.com/wikis/fallout-4

#Fallout #Fallout4 #Gaming
title: Fallout 4's Most Powerful Weapon (Fat Man Nuke!) Is Right Outside the Vault

description:
Stellar Blade quickly throws a lot of terms, and a pretty big skill tree your way, right from the get-go. And so to help cut through the noise and grab the most useful skills as early as you can, here are 11 best skills to get first. You can respec at any time after buying cheap comsumables, so it's worth it to play around with your loadout! 

After all the trailers and even a demo, are you hyped for the release? If so, check out more on Stellar Blade's combat, outfits, gameplay and tips on our wiki:
https://www.ign.com/wikis/stellar-blade/
title: Stellar Blade - 11 Best Skills to Get First

description: Manor Lords does an amazing job of balancing simplicity and complexity to help create an incredible city-builder experience, and you can tailor that experience even further by selecting one of the three pre-existing Game Scenarios: Rise to Prosperity, which tasks players to reach the Large Town settlement level. This guide covers everything you need to know about how to reach the Large Town settlement level quickly and efficiently in Manor Lords.
title: Manor Lords: How to Reach the Large Town Settlement Level

description:

Pools is coming to PC via Steam on April 26, 2024. Check out the Steam page if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2663530/POOLS/

#IGN
title: Pools - Official Launch Trailer

description:
Check out this fun featurette from The Fall Guy, featuring the Stunt Team of the film and star Ryan Gosling. The Fall Guy also stars Emily Blunt.

He’s a stuntman, and like everyone in the stunt community, he gets blown up, shot, crashed, thrown through windows and dropped from the highest of heights, all for our entertainment. And now, fresh off an almost career-ending accident, this working-class hero has to track down a missing movie star, solve a conspiracy and try to win back the love of his life while still doing his day job. What could possibly go right? 

From real life stunt man and director David Leitch, the blockbuster director of Bullet Train, Deadpool 2, Atomic Blonde and Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw and the producer of John Wick, Nobody and Violent Night, comes his most personal film yet. A new hilarious, hard-driving, all-star apex-action thriller and love letter to action movies and the hard-working and under-appreciated crew of people who make them: The Fall
title: The Fall Guy - Official 'Carpool' Behind the Scenes (2024) Ryan Gosling

description:

The Hot Sauce is a limited edition and it’s first come, first serve only while supplies last. So if you’re a STAR WARS fan, a pop culture collector, or just a hot sauce enthusiast, you’re gonna wanna grab the TRUFF STAR WARS Dark Side Hot Sauce now. 

Get 20% off from April 25 - April 30, just click on the shopping buttons here on this video.
title: TRUFF STAR WARS Dark Side Hot Sauce Unboxing

description:
In this Stellar Blade Combat Guide, we're covering 12 tips that will help keep you alive against the hordes of ferocious Naytiba. We cover when you're able to guard cancel and shift to defense, give some tips on how to parry, when to dodge, and some other considerations to keep in mind regarding grenades, beta skills, burst skills and more.

#IGN
title: Stellar Blade: Master These 12 Combat Tips Or You Will Die (A Lot)

description:
Watch the latest Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door trailer to get a deep dive into the upcoming RPG remake. Learn about the story of this storybook adventure, see various locations, and meet playable characters like Bowser and Peach, as well as some of your companions like Goombella, Koops, and Madame Flurrie. The trailer also showcases how you can swap partners and use their abilities on your journey. We also get to meet some of the enemies and get a breakdown of turn-based combat. Join Paper Mario on an adventure in Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door when the remake of the RPG launches on Nintendo Switch on May 23, 2024.

#Gaming #Mario #Nintendo
title: Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door - Official Overview Trailer

Entei is arriving in late May 2024 for Pokemon Sleep on iOS and Android.

description:
With everyone’s recent re-emergence into the world of Fallout, modding is always top of our mind. Here’s a quick breakdown of how to get started modding with Fallout 3, Fallout New Vegas, and Fallout 4. We even go over how it works in Fallout 4 on Xbox and Playstation consoles!

Between small tweaks, graphical overhauls, and just dumb fun additions, there are tons of ways to customize your Fallout experience by modding. Texture packs, new weapons and armor through crafting, reskinned pip boys and more are available with just a little bit of time investment.

Thanks to the awesome modders who made this video possible!
Fallout 4
Fallout 4 Script Extender by F4SE Team
https://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/42147

LooksMenu by Expired6978
https://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/12631/?

Looks Menu Customization Compendium by AGodComplexPikachu, CurioNC, EmissaryOFWind, JTesmer, ANiceOakTree, Kirse10, imAarwyn, Robberfox, RoboAsimov, TrophiHunter, and Wendera
https://www.nexusmods.com/fal
title: How to Install Mods in Fallout 3, Fallout 4, and New Vegas in 2024 | PC & Console
